text: The 1990 MLB Japan All-Star Series was the third edition of the championship, a best-of-eight series between the All-Star teams from Major League Baseball (MLB) and Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB), then-called All-Japan. NPB won the series by 4–3–1 but Ken Griffey Jr. (MLB player) was named MVP. == Results == Championship {| class="wikitable" |- ! Game !! Winning Team !! Score !! Losing Team !!
